title: Intelligent Substation Photonic Circuit Design Automation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Electrical Engineering, Neural Network Algorithm Understanding, Programming Fundamentals (Python), Data Analysis Experience
context.additional_context: Preservice teachers explore integrating AI technologies into education while solving real industrial problems, combining collaborative and individual projects in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Neural network-based decision tree models can automatically generate circuit diagrams that meet substation optical circuit design requirements
The SPCD dataset can be analyzed to extract design standardization patterns and apply them to neural network training
Through project-based assessment, learners can quantitatively analyze design efficiency and accuracy and propose improvement measures
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
